website_summaries.verdict: The Fry Delight makes sense as a second oven, or as a dedicated appliance for frozen apps and sides -- but I could say the same thing about my toaster oven.
pros: The Krups Fry Delight successfully cooked everything we threw at it, including fries, chips, mozzarella sticks, wings, burgers, whole roast chicken and even cake
It's easy to use and dishwasher safe
cons: The bulky, somewhat ugly design leaves a lot to be desired, and nothing we cooked came close to tasting like we had fried it
The 2.5-liter basket didn't seem quite big enough to cook large servings evenly

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was great and replaced the unit immediately
customer_reviews.text: While the fryer seems to fry the food very well, the manufacturing quality is typical of a product made in China. The basket handle fell off within two weeks. I called Krups USA and was told that the lead time for a replacement part was two months. Amazon was great and replaced the unit immediately. I am concerned with this products longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Best frier from solid brand, simple controls
customer_reviews.text: We bought this appliance because it was the only recognizable brand in the sea of no-names. We were sceptical about usefulness of something that's basically small convection oven. It rocks! We do fries, tater puffs and onion rings. They come out great tasting and much healthier than deep fried, The drawer is made of two parts: drawer tray and drawer basket. Both are good but the metal gauges are thin and got to be careful while cleaning, especially mesh screen in basket. The body is plastic. Cleans easily with dishwashing detergent. Two controls: mechanical timer and manual temperature knob. Simple, easy, foolproof. Hopefully, working for many years to come. Highly recommended based on two month ownership
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Broken Handle!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews have stated this product has a major defect. The handle comes right off the basket with no way to repair it. Makes the entire thing useless. We used this 3 times total before it broke. Time for Krups to issue a full recall of these units and stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas DiCaprio

customer_reviews.title: SHODDY CONSTRUCTION
customer_reviews.text: Bought this airfryer for my wife for Christmas. Worked like a charm and made chicken nuggets, fries, and similar crispy and tasty in a relatively short period of time. Problem is, after less than a week of use, the basket handle has fallen off and I can find no place on Krups website where it can be replaced. I will keep trying, but am disappointed in the construction quality of the moving parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff.johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking experience!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Very convenient for small volumes of cooking, for upto three persons. Though this is sold under the Krups brand in USA, the same product is sold as TEFAL in other countries. I have used the TEFAL elsewhere with the same experience, and the reason I purchased it here.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Sivanand

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for cooking then the handle broke! Can't find a replacement. Might as well get a cheaper air fryer if it's going to break right away!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Duerr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect friend for the carnivore diet!
customer_reviews.text: Small in stature, I nonetheless cook 16-oz ribeyes in this thing almost every day. 3 minutes of preheat and six minutes a side renders a perfect medium rare steak. Yum!! Clean up takes two minutes. I highly recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: Like the unit very much cleaning as a little difficult and I screwed up
customer_reviews.text: Are used degreaser on the basket and it took off the finish. I need a new basket. I like the unit very much overall.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Slattery

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen appliance for single parents or anyone that needs dinner quick and painless clean up
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: If you cook from scratch don’t bother!!!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t meet my expectations. I don’t purchase a lot of premade food. I make food from scratch . So the air fryer doesn’t work for me
customer_reviews.author: irene skaar

customer_reviews.title: Literally the worse fryer ever
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! During the very first use of this air fryer, the handle broke off and dropped all the food on the floor. The handle seems to be held on by four weak screws and when the plastic heats up the handle softens and falls apart. I honestly do not understand how this product even has positive reviews. Steer Clear!
customer_reviews.author: LogansTechReview

customer_reviews.title: Good food, fast cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this air fryer. So far I used it for wings (from scratch, not frozen), roasting veggies (faster than the oven), chicken breast, burgers, steak, and obviously fries (frozen). Everything tasted great. Fries are delicious, steak is also really good. Experiences that didn’t work well: battered fish or chicken (not frozen). Too messy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: PGCR

customer_reviews.title: We are pretty happy with this
customer_reviews.text: We are pretty happy with this. It is not a fryer it is a convection oven.There are plenty of recipes online and we have liked them all. I like not having to deal with oil anymore.
customer_reviews.author: consumer22

customer_reviews.title: KRUPS AJ1000US Air Fryer Low-Fat with Adjustable Temperature
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of using an air fryer! However in cooking for several people I realized that this item is better when cooking one or two items for one person. So I am now replacing this air fryer with an more useful appliance to be able to accommodate preparation of more food at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Eboyr

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Made buffalo wings and came out nice and crispy. Everything I tried on this air fryer has come out yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Tlove

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Get one, you will love it. Great for chicken and taters
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Krispy
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it. It cooks as expected. Nice and Krispy.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas B.

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke off right after first use
customer_reviews.text: The handle for the basket broke right off the basket when my wife pulled it out of the air fryer. There were some tiny screws that held the whole thing together and they stripped out of the plastic. All that was in the basket were a couple chicken breasts.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke off
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this. The handle broke off after a month. They won’t replace it either. It’s completely stripped bc of the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Handle is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer other than the handle snapping off after 2 uses! I noticed the small screws were not tightly screwed in and fell off into the bottom of the basket. Not something I'd want to bite into or choke on while eating. This handle defect seems to be the most common problem with this air fryer. I bought mine at Home Depot and no sure if I purchased a warranty, but I want my handle back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Cheatwood

customer_reviews.title: Handle breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke off within 24 hours of use. Horribly made and a complete waste of money. I dont even want a replacement just a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The handle keeps breaking
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it and they were great about sending a new one, but then the handle broke again
customer_reviews.author: Mia Crawford

product_meta.title: KRUPS AJ1000US Air Fryer Low-Fat with Adjustable Temperature, 2.5 L, Black
product_meta.description: Healthy frying thanks to the 3d air pulse technology, fry delight can cook crispy and tasty fried food with little to no oil. Fry delight is equipped with an air cooking technology, the 3d air pulse technology, that operates using an upper heating element and an optimized airflow. The 3d air pulse technology gives the food an incomparable crispness outside while keeping a tenderness inside using little to no oil. More than just frying: fry, grill, roast and bake all your favorite meals in addition to frying, fry delight allows to grill, roast and bake all your favorite meals with perfect results. Ideal for daily use, fry delight ensures a healthy, rapid and easy cooking. Fast fry delight cooks 2 servings of chips/fries in 15Min with fry delight, successfully prepare basic healthy dishes for your family in no time.
feature_bullets: Low fat fryer with 3D air pulse technology for healthier frying

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars32 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
